translation.en: [woman] This is my diary.
translation.it: Questo è il mio diario.

translation.en: I'm reading you the excerpt from December 12, 1978.
translation.it: Vi leggo un estratto del 12 dicembre 1978.

translation.en: So, it says, "Today was an absolute miserable day."
translation.it: "Oggi è stata una giornata pessima.

translation.en: "Rob never came home last night."
translation.it: Ieri Rob non è tornato a casa.

translation.en: "He never got back to the store, and he never went home."
translation.it: Non è tornato al negozio e non è andato a casa."

translation.en: [woman] When I was about 15, I started working at Nisson Pharmacy.
translation.it: A circa 15 anni, iniziai a lavorare alla farmacia Nisson.

translation.en: I was a clerk. I was the person at the front and ran the cash register.
translation.it: Ero una commessa. Stavo al banco e gestivo la cassa.

translation.en: I met Rob Piest when he came to work at the pharmacy.
translation.it: Conobbi Rob Piest quando venne a lavorare lì.

translation.en: He was the new stock boy.
translation.it: Era il nuovo magazziniere.

translation.en: He did sports.
translation.it: Faceva sport.

translation.en: He was a gymnast.
translation.it: Era un ginnasta.

translation.en: And he had outdoor interests, um, in hiking, and he was a photographer.
translation.it: Era interessato all'escursionismo e faceva il fotografo.

translation.en: He was actually working there to save money for a camera and a car.
translation.it: Lavorava lì per risparmiare per una macchina fotografica e un'auto.

translation.en: He was very close with his family. He loved his family and he talked about 'em a lot.
translation.it: Era molto legato alla sua famiglia, l'amava e ne parlava molto.

translation.en: I remember when I came to work on December 11.
translation.it: Ricordo quando arrivai al lavoro l'11 dicembre.

translation.en: In December in Chicago, it is freezing.
translation.it: A dicembre, a Chicago si gela.

translation.en: And the cash register was right at the front of the door,
translation.it: Il registratore di cassa era proprio davanti alla porta,

translation.en: and people were in and out a lot, and I would get cold.
translation.it: le persone entravano e uscivano e io avevo freddo.

translation.en: And so, Rob had a very nice, uh, blue down jacket.
translation.it: Rob aveva un bellissimo piumino blu.

translation.en: So I asked him if I could borrow it and wear it at the front while I was working the cash register.
translation.it: Gli chiesi se potesse prestarmelo per indossarlo mentre lavoravo alla cassa.

translation.en: There was a man, a middle-aged man in, you know, a flannel shirt
translation.it: C'era un uomo di mezza età con una camicia di flanella

translation.en: walking around the store.
translation.it: che girava per il negozio.

translation.en: I asked the pharmacist and he said, oh, he was a contractor
translation.it: Chiesi al farmacista e mi disse che era un appaltatore

translation.en: who was there because they were thinking about doing some remodeling in the store.
translation.it: ed era lì perché stavano pensando di ristrutturare il negozio.

translation.en: As the night was winding down,
translation.it: Con l'avvicinarsi della sera,

translation.en: Rob came back to the front of the counter and said, "Hey, can I have my jacket back?"
translation.it: Rob tornò al banco e disse: "Posso riavere la mia giacca?

translation.en: "I'm gonna go outside and talk to that contractor about a job."
translation.it: Devo uscire a parlare di un lavoro con quell'appaltatore".

translation.en: And then he put his jacket on and he went outside.
translation.it: Poi si mise la giacca e uscì.

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] And then, you know, the store stayed busy.
translation.it: Il negozio era pieno di clienti.

translation.en: So I kind of lost track of time and the fact that, you know, we were getting ready to close.
translation.it: Non mi accorsi del tempo che passava e del fatto che stavamo per chiudere.

translation.en: And his mom came in and wanted to know where he was.
translation.it: Sua madre entrò per sapere dove fosse.

translation.en: And I asked her, I said, "He's outside talking to some contractor about a job."
translation.it: Io le dissi: "È qui fuori a parlare di lavoro con un appaltatore".

translation.en: And she said, no, he… she didn't see him out there.
translation.it: Lei disse di non averlo visto di fuori.

translation.en: So she said, "Tell him just call me when he gets back, and I will come over and pick him up."
translation.it: Poi disse: "Gli dica di chiamarmi quando torna e verrò a prenderlo".

translation.en: And so, when the final closing was at 10:00,
translation.it: L'ora di chiusura era alle 22:00.

translation.en: um, his mom had called and said, "Is he back yet?"
translation.it: Sua madre chiamò e disse: "È tornato?"

translation.en: And I said, "No. He's not here at all."
translation.it: E io: "No, qui non c'è".

translation.en: I knew that that night was Rob's mom's birthday.
translation.it: Sapevo che era il compleanno della mamma di Rob.

translation.en: That's why she waited for a while, 'cause they had a birthday celebration planned for that night.
translation.it: Lei aspettò un po', perché avevano organizzato una festa.

translation.en: Rob would never have missed his mom's birthday.
translation.it: Rob non si sarebbe mai perso il suo compleanno.

translation.en: He was missing.
translation.it: Era scomparso.

translation.en: [Gacy] First of all, drop that "Mr. Gacy" thing.
translation.it: - Lascia perdere quel "signor Gacy". - Ok, John.

translation.en: [investigator] Okay, John. That was technical.
translation.it: Era una questione tecnica.

translation.en: [Gacy] I don't know who the hell you're talking to. Just John.
translation.it: Non so a chi diavolo stai parlando. È solo John.

translation.en: [investigator] Okay, John. Go ahead.
translation.it: Ok, John, continua.

translation.en: [Gacy] John, or JW, or whatever the hell else they call me,
translation.it: John, J.W. o come diavolo mi chiamano.

translation.en: or whatever else comes to your mind if I get too mad.
translation.it: O come ti pare, se ti faccio arrabbiare.

translation.en: [Gacy] Nobody wants to accept what the hell I say.
translation.it: Nessuno vuole accettare quello che dico.

translation.en: Because what I tell you is… is what I know as fact.
translation.it: Perché quello che vi dico è ciò che so per certo.

translation.en: I have nothing to gain. I have nothing to lose by telling you something that's not the truth.
translation.it: Non ho niente da guadagnare o da perdere a dirvi qualcosa che non sia la verità.

translation.en: But I'm getting to the point that I keep going over and over and over every fucking thing.
translation.it: Ma ormai continuo a ripetere ogni cazzo di cosa.

translation.en: But I'm at the breaking point with it.
translation.it: Sono al punto di non poterne più.

translation.en: I don't… I don't know how much more of this shit I can take.
translation.it: Non so per quanto ancora sopporterò questa merda.

translation.en: -[investigator] What do you think happen-- -[Gacy] I don't know. I… I don't.
translation.it: - Cosa pensi sia successo a… - Non lo so. Davvero.

translation.en: [man] 1978. I had just left the Public Defender's Office.
translation.it: Nel 1978 avevo appena lasciato l'incarico di difensore d'ufficio.

translation.en: I decided to go into private practice.
translation.it: Avevo deciso di mettermi in proprio.

translation.en: Sitting in my new office and, uh, I get a telephone call.
translation.it: Ero seduto nel mio nuovo ufficio e ricevetti una telefonata.

translation.en: [Amirante] I said, "Law office." He said, "Hi, Sam. This is John Gacy."
translation.it: Dissi: "Studio legale". "Ciao, Sam. Sono John Gacy."

translation.en: I said, "Hi, John, how are you?" He said, "Can you do me a favor?"
translation.it: "Ciao, John, come stai?" "Puoi farmi un favore?"

translation.en: I said, "Sure. What do you need?"
translation.it: "Certo. Cosa ti serve?"

translation.en: "Find out why I'm being tailed by the Des Plaines police." "No problem."
translation.it: "Scopri perché la polizia mi pedina." "Certo, lo scoprirò."

translation.en: [Sam] I had been Chief Public Defender in Des Plaines, where this was going on.
translation.it: Ero stato capo difensore d'ufficio a Des Plaines, il luogo dei fatti.

translation.en: I knew all those guys over there. I know the chief, I know the mayor.
translation.it: Conoscevo tutti quanti: il capo della polizia, il sindaco.

translation.en: I'll… I'll find out. I'll ask some questions, I'll ask around.
translation.it: L'avrei scoperto, avrei chiesto un po' in giro.

translation.en: And so, my first client in my private practice was John Gacy.
translation.it: Così, il mio primo cliente privato fu John Gacy.

translation.en: You know, everybody from the neighborhood,
translation.it: Tutti quelli del quartiere, della periferia nord-ovest di Chicago,

translation.en: from the northwest suburbs of Chicago knew John Gacy.
translation.it: Tutti quelli del quartiere, della periferia nord-ovest di Chicago, conoscevano John Gacy.

translation.en: He had a construction business called Painting, Decorating and Maintenance.
translation.it: Aveva un'impresa edile chiamata "Painting, Decorating & Maintenance".

translation.en: He was also a Democratic Precinct Captain in the Cook County Democratic Organization.
translation.it: Era anche capitano di distretto dei Democratici della contea di Cook.

translation.en: Precinct Captains take care of the people in the neighborhood.
translation.it: I capitani si prendono cura della gente del quartiere.

translation.en: So if somebody needed a garbage can, or somebody needed a bulb changed,
translation.it: Se a qualcuno serviva un bidone, cambiare una lampadina,

translation.en: or somebody needed their driveway shoveled, or something,
translation.it: spazzare il vialetto di casa o altro,

translation.en: the Precinct Captain would be there to help them.
translation.it: il capitano era lì per aiutarlo.

translation.en: Gacy was the best Precinct Captain in the Norwood Park Democratic Organization.
translation.it: Gacy era il miglior capitano di distretto dei Democratici di Norwood Park.

translation.en: Everybody knew him.
translation.it: Lo conoscevano tutti.

translation.en: I got active in the Democratic Party because I wanted to get into politics someday.
translation.it: Ero entrato nel Partito Democratico perché volevo entrare in politica.

translation.en: And so, I knew him through doing that.
translation.it: Lo conoscevo per quello.

translation.en: He called me because he thought I had influence.
translation.it: Mi chiamò per la mia influenza.

translation.en: Not because he thought I was a great lawyer. He thought I had clout.
translation.it: Non pensava che fossi un buon avvocato, ma che avessi influenza.

translation.en: So the first thing I did was go to the police.
translation.it: La prima cosa che feci fu andare alla polizia.

translation.en: "Hey, John Gacy's a good guy. What are you guys following him for?"
translation.it: "John Gacy è un brav'uomo. Perché lo state pedinando?"

translation.en: They'd say, "There's a missing kid. We think he has something to do with it."
translation.it: "C'è un ragazzo scomparso. Pensiamo sia coinvolto."

translation.en: I'd be like, "You're crazy, a missing kid. You obviously have the wrong guy."
translation.it: "Siete pazzi! Un ragazzo scomparso? Avete sbagliato persona."

translation.en: [man 1] I was assigned to the Piest case the day after he disappeared.
translation.it: Fui assegnato al caso di Robert Piest il giorno dopo la sua scomparsa.

translation.en: Rob Piest had a part-time job at Nisson Drugs.
translation.it: Piest lavorava part-time alla farmacia Nisson,

translation.en: It was on Touhy Avenue in Des Plaines.
translation.it: sulla Touhy Avenue a Des Plaines.

translation.en: A missing persons report was filed by the Piest family.
translation.it: La famiglia Piest denunciò la scomparsa.

translation.en: They were in shock, I believe, because this is just so unlike the young man to disappear.
translation.it: Erano sotto shock, credo, perché non era da lui scomparire così.

translation.en: When Mr. and Mrs. Piest came into the office,
translation.it: Quando i signori Piest entrarono in ufficio,

translation.en: uh, they were… uh, distraught, completely.
translation.it: erano completamente sconvolti.

translation.en: They had been out all night searching for Rob.
translation.it: Erano stati fuori tutta la notte a cercare Rob.

translation.en: We talked, and they convinced me in about a minute,
translation.it: Parlammo e in un minuto mi convinsero

translation.en: that, in fact, uh, we had something more than a runaway on our hands.
translation.it: che avevamo tra le mani qualcosa di più di un fuggitivo.

translation.en: And that's really what led our office, that is the prosecutor's office,
translation.it: Quello portò il nostro ufficio, cioè l'ufficio del procuratore,

translation.en: uh, to become involved in the case.
translation.it: a essere coinvolto nel caso.

translation.en: [man 2] Rob Piest was a great all-American kid, 15 years old.
translation.it: Rob Piest era un tipico ragazzo americano di 15 anni.

translation.en: Come from a very stable family, well-liked by everybody,
translation.it: Veniva da una famiglia solida, era benvoluto da tutti,

translation.en: didn't have any girlfriend problems or any other issues.
translation.it: non aveva problemi con le ragazze o altro.

translation.en: And he had a… a brother and a sister.
translation.it: Aveva un fratello e una sorella.

translation.en: Uh, he was the youngest.
translation.it: Era il più giovane.

translation.en: And everybody got along well with that family.
translation.it: Tutti andavano d'accordo con quella famiglia.

translation.en: [Tovar] The officer that filed the missing persons report
translation.it: L'agente che aveva registrato la denuncia di scomparsa

translation.en: went back to the drug store and asked who had been there that night
translation.it: tornò alla farmacia e chiese chi c'era quella sera

translation.en: and incorporated all those names of the people that had been there.
translation.it: e registrò tutti i nomi delle persone presenti.

translation.en: Among them was John Wayne Gacy's name.
translation.it: Tra questi c'era John Wayne Gacy.

translation.en: He was there to, uh, get an estimate for a job he wanted to do there at the drugstore.
translation.it: Era lì per fare una stima per un lavoro nella farmacia.

translation.en: One of the first things we always do, we see who we're dealing with.
translation.it: Una cosa che facciamo sempre è vedere con chi abbiamo a che fare.

translation.en: So we started running the names, checking them for criminal histories.
translation.it: Così iniziammo a controllare nomi e fedine penali.

translation.en: I think the next-to-last name I checked was Gacy's name.
translation.it: Il penultimo nome fu quello di Gacy.

translation.en: And we immediately got a hit on him, that he had done time in Iowa for sodomy.
translation.it: Scoprimmo subito che era stato in galera in Iowa per sodomia.

translation.en: So immediately, that put him at the head of the line as far as possible persons of interest.
translation.it: Questo lo mise subito in cima alla lista come possibile indiziato.

translation.en: John Wayne Gacy lived in Norwood Park Township.
translation.it: John Wayne Gacy viveva a Norwood Park.

translation.en: It's a Chicago address,
translation.it: È un indirizzo di Chicago,

translation.en: but it's an unincorporated area of Cook County.
translation.it: ma è una zona non incorporata della contea di Cook.

translation.en: [Albrecht] Joseph Kozenczak was Head of Investigations of the Des Plaines Police Department.
translation.it: Joseph Kozenczak era l'investigatore capo della polizia di Des Plaines.

translation.en: He went out to talk to John Gacy.
translation.it: Andò a parlare con John Gacy.

translation.en: [Gacy] Lieutenant Kozenczak, the asshole from Des Plaines Police Department,
translation.it: Il tenente Kozenczak, lo stronzo della polizia di Des Plaines,

translation.en: talked to me about the Piest boy disappearance,
translation.it: mi ha parlato della scomparsa di Piest.

translation.en: asked me if I'd come down and give a witness statement.
translation.it: Mi ha chiesto di fare una deposizione.

translation.en: I told him I didn't have time, that I'd just had a death in the family,
translation.it: Ho detto che non avevo tempo, che avevo avuto un lutto,

translation.en: that I'm waiting for a call from my mother in Arkansas.
translation.it: che stavo aspettando una chiamata da mia madre in Arkansas.

translation.en: So he told Kozenczak he had to take care of his family things,
translation.it: Disse a Kozenczak che doveva occuparsi di cose di famiglia

translation.en: and Kozenczak told him it would just be a while, just come out.
translation.it: Disse a Kozenczak che doveva occuparsi di cose di famiglia e Kozenczak gli disse che ci sarebbe voluto poco.

translation.en: He got very aggravated about that.
translation.it: Questo lo disturbò molto.

translation.en: He said, "You know, Kozenczak has no respect for the dead."
translation.it: Disse: "Kozenczak non ha rispetto per i morti".

translation.en: [Gacy] I said, "You're very rude at the time of death."
translation.it: Ho detto: "È scortese, in un momento di lutto".

translation.en: And I just told him, you know, "When I got time, I'd get down there."
translation.it: E gli ho detto: "Passerò quando avrò tempo, più tardi".

translation.en: I said, "I'll come down later." "How much later?"
translation.it: "Passerò quando avrò tempo, più tardi". "Quanto più tardi?" "Non lo so, ma passerò."

translation.en: "I don't know. When I get down there, I'll be down there."
translation.it: "Quanto più tardi?" "Non lo so, ma passerò."

translation.en: [Tovar] One detective was assigned to watch the house.
translation.it: Un detective fu assegnato a sorvegliare la casa.

translation.en: They had seen Gacy arrive in his van.
translation.it: Videro arrivare Gacy sul suo furgone.

translation.en: Well, when the van left, they followed the van, thinking that Gacy was in it,
translation.it: Quando il furgone ripartì, lo seguirono pensando che ci fosse Gacy.

translation.en: when, in fact, it was one of his workers that took the van.
translation.it: In realtà, nel furgone c'era uno dei suoi dipendenti.

translation.en: When they finally caught up to it, they realized it wasn't Gacy.
translation.it: Quando alla fine lo raggiunsero, capirono che non era lui.

translation.en: By that time, Gacy was gone.
translation.it: Ormai Gacy era sparito.

translation.en: [man 3] When Gacy did come into the police station,
translation.it: Quando Gacy venne alla centrale

translation.en: he comes in at 3:00 in the morning, everybody's gone.
translation.it: erano le tre del mattino e non c'era nessuno.

translation.en: He's covered with mud. His pants are full of mud. His, you know, his shoes are all full of mud.
translation.it: Era ricoperto di fango, sui pantaloni e sulle scarpe.

translation.en: His car with the back bumper was packed with mud.
translation.it: Il paraurti dell'auto era sporco di fango.

translation.en: There was mud up to the axles. He had mud all over the floorboard.
translation.it: C'era fango fino agli assali, fango sul pianale.

translation.en: Uh, and there was nobody there to talk to him. So he left.
translation.it: Non c'era nessuno per parlargli, così se ne andò.

translation.en: [Gacy] I drove over to the Des Plaines police station because I knew they were waiting for me.
translation.it: Sono andato alla centrale, perché sapevo che mi aspettavano.

translation.en: [investigator] Who'd you see?
translation.it: E chi hai visto?

translation.en: [Gacy] I said, "I'm here to see Lt. Kozenczak." He says, "Oh, he left hours ago."
translation.it: Ho detto: "Devo vedere Kozenczak". E lui: "Se n'è andato ore fa".

translation.en: I says, "Well, okay, tell him I'll be back in the morning."
translation.it: Ho detto: "Ok, gli dica che tornerò domattina".

translation.en: [Bedoe] But what happened? Why did he get covered with mud?
translation.it: Ma cos'era successo? Perché era coperto di fango?

translation.en: How'd he get mud in the car?
translation.it: Perché c'era fango nell'auto?

translation.en: [Gacy] I went down to the police station around ten, eleven o'clock in the morning.
translation.it: Sono andato alla stazione di polizia verso le 10:00 o le 11:00 del mattino.

translation.en: They said, "Mr. Kozenczak wants to talk to you."
translation.it: Hanno detto: "Kozenczak vuole parlarle".

translation.en: I said, "All right, I'll wait a few minutes."
translation.it: E io "Ok, aspetterò qualche minuto".

translation.en: 11:00 came, 12:00 came, I says, "Look," I says, "I've got to go
translation.it: Sono arrivate le 11:00 e le 12:00. Ho detto: "Devo andare, ho delle cose da fare".

translation.en: 'cause I've got things to do."
translation.it: Ho detto: "Devo andare, ho delle cose da fare".

translation.en: I don't know what they were waiting for.
translation.it: Non so cosa stessero aspettando.

translation.en: [Tovar] They told me to entertain him for a while.
translation.it: Mi dissero di intrattenerlo per un po'.

translation.en: He was not under arrest, we couldn't detain him.
translation.it: Non era in arresto, non potevamo trattenerlo.

translation.en: So I had to use, you know, my imagination on how to keep him there.
translation.it: Dovevo usare l'immaginazione per tenerlo lì.

translation.en: I've been a pretty good judge of character,
translation.it: Ero bravo a giudicare le persone

translation.en: and I quickly determined this guy had a big ego,
translation.it: e avevo capito subito che aveva un grande ego,

translation.en: so I just kinda fed on that a little bit.
translation.it: così gli diedi un po' di corda.

translation.en: And a lot of times he was just full of crap, you know.
translation.it: Spesso diceva un sacco di stronzate, esagerava la sua importanza,

translation.en: He was exaggerating his importance, you know, but I didn't care.
translation.it: Spesso diceva un sacco di stronzate, esagerava la sua importanza, ma a me importava solo che restasse lì senza doverlo costringere.

translation.en: All I cared was he was staying there without me having to force him to stay there.
translation.it: ma a me importava solo che restasse lì senza doverlo costringere.

translation.en: [Sullivan] So I go over to the little room, introduce myself.
translation.it: Entrai nella stanzetta, mi presentai.

translation.en: And I said, uh, "Do you want to give us permission to… to go take a look in your house?"
translation.it: Dissi: "Vuole darci il permesso di dare un'occhiata a casa sua?

translation.en: "Since you're telling us you've got nothing to hide."
translation.it: Dato che non ha niente da nascondere".

translation.en: He said, "No. I'm not gonna give you permission."
translation.it: "No, non vi darò il permesso."

translation.en: I already suspected the guy.
translation.it: Sospettavo già di lui.

translation.en: Now the question is, what does he have to hide?
translation.it: La domanda era: cosa aveva da nascondere?

translation.en: If we're gonna get a search warrant, we'd better get it soon
translation.it: Se serviva un mandato, bisognava averlo presto,

translation.en: so that he doesn't destroy anything that might be there.
translation.it: così non avrebbe distrutto potenziali prove.

translation.en: [Gacy] Then around 3:30 or 4:30, or I don't know what the hell time it was,
translation.it: Poi, verso le 15:30 o le 16:30 o non so che cavolo di ora fosse,

translation.en: they wanted the keys for my house and that.
translation.it: mi hanno chiesto le chiavi di casa.

translation.en: "What do you want the keys for my house?"
translation.it: "Perché volete le mie chiavi?"

translation.en: "We've got a search warrant for your house,
translation.it: "Abbiamo un mandato di perquisizione.

translation.en: so you either give us the keys or we're gonna kick the door down."
translation.it: O ci dà le chiavi o buttiamo giù la porta."

translation.en: I said, "I don't have to give you nothing." You know?
translation.it: Ho detto: "Non devo darvi niente".

translation.en: But they… they took the keys from me.
translation.it: Ma mi hanno preso le chiavi.

translation.en: [Bedoe] The investigators from Des Plaines,
translation.it: Gli investigatori di Des Plaines, durante la perquisizione,

translation.en: when they executed the search warrant, they were looking for Robert Piest.
translation.it: Gli investigatori di Des Plaines, durante la perquisizione, stavano cercando Robert Piest.

translation.en: We were optimistic that maybe he was being held captive.
translation.it: Speravamo che fosse tenuto prigioniero.

translation.en: [Tovar] Gacy's house was decorated very eclectic.
translation.it: La casa di Gacy aveva un arredamento molto eclettico.

translation.en: He had a tiki bar there and a pool table.
translation.it: Aveva un tiki bar e un tavolo da biliardo.

translation.en: In the bedrooms, he had pictures of clowns.
translation.it: Nelle camere da letto aveva quadri di clown.

translation.en: They were a little weird.
translation.it: Erano un po' strani.

translation.en: I think they were more evil than… [chuckles] …than nice clowns, you know, but…
translation.it: Credo che fossero più clown malvagi che clown buoni, ma…

translation.en: to each his own.
translation.it: a ciascuno il suo.

translation.en: [Tovar] He had an office where he had all sorts of things on his, uh, bulletin board.
translation.it: Aveva un ufficio dove teneva di tutto sulla bacheca,

translation.en: But the hallway
translation.it: ma il corridoio che andava dalla cucina alle camere sul retro

translation.en: going from the front from the kitchen to the back bedrooms was really bizarre.
translation.it: ma il corridoio che andava dalla cucina alle camere sul retro era davvero bizzarro.

translation.en: It was dark brown,
