translation.it: grazie alla luce dalla finestra, vedevo il suo volto.

translation.en: Well, that's a sight I'll… uh, that actually still haunts me to this day.
translation.it: Beh, è un'immagine che mi perseguita ancora oggi.

translation.en: [emotionally] And, uh…
translation.it: E…

translation.en: the face that I saw that night was, um…
translation.it: il viso che vidi quella notte era…

translation.en: I don't know how to explain it. It was just frightful.
translation.it: Non so come spiegarlo, era spaventoso.

translation.en: He had a knife that was right in the little hole in your throat here.
translation.it: Aveva un coltello puntato al piccolo buco della gola qui.

translation.en: He was pushing that knife right there.
translation.it: Spingeva quel coltello proprio qui.

translation.en: And rubbing my leg at the same time.
translation.it: E allo stesso tempo mi sfregava la gamba.

translation.en: And he told me that we're going to finish what we started in the basement
translation.it: Mi disse che avremmo finito quello che avevamo iniziato di sotto

translation.en: and we're going to commit sex acts on each… on each other.
translation.it: e che avremmo compiuto atti sessuali l'uno con l'altro.

translation.en: So I just started bawling again
translation.it: Così ricominciai a urlare.

translation.en: and just crying and begging him not to do this.
translation.it: Non facevo altro che piangere e implorarlo di non farlo.

translation.en: And pretty soon, he let the pressure off the knife,
translation.it: Subito dopo, smise di fare pressione con il coltello

translation.en: and he started laughing again
translation.it: e ricominciò a ridere,

translation.en: and explained to me that he was frustrated with himself
translation.it: spiegandomi che era frustrato con se stesso

translation.en: that he was not able to break me in the basement
translation.it: per non essere riuscito a farmi cedere nel seminterrato

translation.en: when he was doing these psychological tests on me,
translation.it: mentre mi faceva quei test psicologici.

translation.en: and that he is frustrated and he wanted to give it one more try.
translation.it: Era frustrato e voleva fare un altro tentativo.

translation.en: I wasn't buying it.
translation.it: Non ci credevo.

translation.en: Then he left, went in his bedroom,
translation.it: Se ne andò in camera sua,

translation.en: and I got up instantly and got dressed and sat on that bed until 6:30.
translation.it: io mi vestii e rimasi seduto su quel letto fino alle 6:30.

translation.en: In the morning, I banged on his door and I said, "I'm ready to go."
translation.it: La mattina bussai alla sua porta e dissi: "Sono pronto ad andare".

translation.en: It's about an hour and a half drive to Iowa Falls.
translation.it: Iowa Falls dista circa un'ora e mezza d'auto.

translation.en: And he said, "Now, Steve, I know that you're upset with me,
translation.it: Lui disse: "Steve, so che sei arrabbiato con me.

translation.en: but I want you to understand,
translation.it: Ma voglio che tu capisca.

translation.en: if I find out you mentioned this to anybody,
translation.it: Se scopro che ne hai parlato con qualcuno,

translation.en: all I have to do is pick up the phone and make one phone call to Chicago,
translation.it: devo solo prendere il telefono e fare una telefonata a Chicago.

translation.en: and there will be a man in Iowa Falls the next day to kill you."
translation.it: Il giorno dopo ci sarà un uomo a Iowa Falls per ucciderti".

translation.en: I didn't report it to the Waterloo police because I didn't want to discuss it.
translation.it: Non lo denunciai alla polizia di Waterloo perché non volevo parlarne.

translation.en: I was a young 18-year-old kid and…
translation.it: Ero un ragazzino di 18 anni

translation.en: and I have a grown man making me pull my pants down,
translation.it: e c'era un uomo adulto che mi faceva abbassare i pantaloni,

translation.en: and a grown man putting a knife to my throat and rubbing my… my thigh.
translation.it: mi puntava un coltello alla gola e mi massaggiava la coscia.

translation.en: That's… It's not something a young boy wants to talk about.
translation.it: Non è una cosa di cui un ragazzino vuole parlare.

translation.en: [Burger] I think I always felt, uh, John was, uh, aggressive
translation.it: Avevo sempre pensato che John fosse aggressivo

translation.en: and wanted to advance within the Jaycees.
translation.it: e volesse avanzare all'interno dei Jaycees.

translation.en: He was ultimately appointed by one of my successors
translation.it: Alla fine fu nominato da uno dei miei successori

translation.en: to be the chaplain for the Waterloo Jaycees,
translation.it: come cappellano dei Waterloo Jaycees.

translation.en: which primarily was to give a blessing at when we had meals.
translation.it: In sostanza doveva dire una preghiera prima dei pasti.

translation.en: And it was after that that his aspirations to become the president emerged.
translation.it: Fu in seguito che emersero le sue aspirazioni a diventare presidente.

translation.en: I guess this was when the rumors started coming out
translation.it: Immagino che fu allora che iniziarono a diffondersi le voci

translation.en: that John Gacy was not all what he appeared to be.
translation.it: secondo cui John Gacy non era quello che sembrava.

translation.en: [Gacy] Long about '67 when I was running for Jaycee President,
translation.it: Nel '67, quando mi sono candidato alla presidenza dei Jaycees,

translation.en: I asked Donald Voorhees Sr. to become my campaign manager.
translation.it: ho chiesto a Donald Voorhees Sr. di farmi da manager della campagna.

translation.en: [Burger] Don Voorhees Sr. was a member of the Jaycees.
translation.it: Don Voorhees Sr. era un membro dei Jaycees.

translation.en: He then ran for the state legislature
translation.it: Poi si candidò al parlamento statale

translation.en: and was elected as a member of the Iowa State Legislature.
translation.it: e fu eletto membro del parlamento dell'Iowa.

translation.en: [Gacy] In the incident with this Donald Voorhees Jr., he was 15 years old.
translation.it: Nell'episodio con Donald Voorhees Jr., lui aveva 15 anni.

translation.en: I think it was in '67,
translation.it: Credo fosse nel '67, in estate.

translation.en: the summer of '67, or August of '67, or September of '67,
translation.it: Credo fosse nel '67, in estate. Ad agosto o a settembre del '67, una cosa così.

translation.en: somewhere in there.
translation.it: Ad agosto o a settembre del '67, una cosa così.

translation.en: Donald Voorhees, I was driving from one store to the other,
translation.it: Donald Voorhees… Io guidavo da un locale all'altro, era la mia routine quotidiana.

translation.en: which was my daily routine.
translation.it: Io guidavo da un locale all'altro, era la mia routine quotidiana.

translation.en: Donald Voorhees was hitchhiking.
translation.it: Donald Voorhees faceva l'autostop.

translation.en: I picked him up.
translation.it: L'ho fatto salire.

translation.en: He was asking me about the stag films.
translation.it: Mi faceva domande sui film a luci rosse.

translation.en: [Gacy] So me, like… like an asshole, I… I took him over to my house and I showed him the films.
translation.it: Così io, da bravo coglione, l'ho portato a casa e glieli ho mostrati.

translation.en: Of course, I got horny by watching 'em.
translation.it: Mi sono arrapato a guardarli.

translation.en: And anyhow, you know, to cut the conversation short, what… what happened is that he ended up blowing me,
translation.it: Comunque, per farla breve, è successo che mi ha fatto un pompino

translation.en: and I believe I went down on him.
translation.it: e io l'ho fatto a lui.

translation.en: I had a wife. I had two children. I… I had business. I had wealth.
translation.it: Avevo una moglie. Avevo due figli. Avevo un'impresa. Ero ricco.

translation.en: Why in the fuck did I go out and get myself involved with a kid?
translation.it: Perché cazzo sono finito a farmi coinvolgere da un ragazzo?

translation.en: He told his dad.
translation.it: REATO CON UN MINORENNE L'ha detto a suo padre, che ha contattato il procuratore di Stato

translation.en: Well, his dad turned around and got ahold of the state's attorney,
translation.it: L'ha detto a suo padre, che ha contattato il procuratore di Stato

translation.en: and then I was, uh, charged with it.
translation.it: e poi mi hanno incriminato.

translation.en: [Burger] Once John was arrested for the assault on Donald Jr.,
translation.it: Dopo l'arresto di John per l'aggressione a Donald Jr.,

translation.en: it became much more of a topic of conversation in town.
translation.it: in città diventò un argomento di conversazione.

translation.en: [Gacy] So then I was subsequently indicted for sodomy.
translation.it: Così sono stato incriminato per sodomia. ACCUSA DI SODOMIA PER GACY

translation.en: When I went through the psychiatric evaluation at Iowa City,
translation.it: Alla valutazione psichiatrica a Iowa City

translation.en: I was told I had an anti-social personality,
translation.it: hanno detto che avevo una personalità antisociale.

translation.en: that it was deemed as an experimental-type thing and that
translation.it: La consideravano una cosa occasionale

translation.en: they felt that it would be not a reoccurring thing, and…
translation.it: e pensavano che non sarebbe ricapitato e…

translation.en: that it was-- The whole thing was stupid.
translation.it: È stata una cosa stupida. NEGAZIONE TOTALE

translation.en: That it should've never happened.
translation.it: Non sarebbe mai dovuta succedere.

translation.en: That's why I keep saying instead of being the perpetrator,
translation.it: Ecco perché dico di non essere il colpevole, ma la vittima.

translation.en: I was the victim. I was used.
translation.it: Ecco perché dico di non essere il colpevole, ma la vittima. Sono stato usato.

translation.en: I was thinking of the kids, and I was thinking of Marlynn,
translation.it: Pensavo ai bambini e a Marlynn.

translation.en: and I'd never got in trouble before.
translation.it: Non avevo mai avuto guai

translation.en: And when the pre-sentence report come back that they recommended that… I should be given, uh, probation.
translation.it: e nel rapporto prima della sentenza hanno consigliato la libertà vigilata.

translation.en: And we changed our plea from "not guilty" to "guilty,"
translation.it: Abbiamo cambiato dichiarazione da "non colpevole" a "colpevole".

translation.en: and they set sentencing.
translation.it: Abbiamo cambiato dichiarazione da "non colpevole" a "colpevole". Mi hanno condannato a dieci anni e sono quasi svenuto.

translation.en: Sentenced me to 10 years, and I nearly dropped.
translation.it: Mi hanno condannato a dieci anni e sono quasi svenuto.

translation.en: I could not believe it.
translation.it: Non ci credevo.

translation.en: The day after I was sentenced, I was served with divorce papers from Marlynn
translation.it: Il giorno dopo la condanna, ho ricevuto la richiesta di divorzio di Marlynn.

translation.en: on grounds of conviction.
translation.it: Motivata dalla condanna.

translation.en: She came there to see me for the last time.
translation.it: È venuta a trovarmi per l'ultima volta.

translation.en: She came to me, and she told me that she had to get a divorce.
translation.it: È venuta da me e mi ha detto che doveva divorziare.

translation.en: That if she didn't get a divorce, her dad was gonna take the kids away from her.
translation.it: Se non l'avesse fatto, il padre le avrebbe tolto i figli.

translation.en: [investigator] Now these were your natural children, right?
translation.it: Erano i tuoi figli naturali, vero?

translation.en: [Gacy] Right.
translation.it: Esatto.

translation.en: [clears throat] Right. That's how young they were.
translation.it: Esatto. Erano piccolissimi.

translation.en: 1968, last time I ever seen 'em.
translation.it: Il 1968, l'ultima volta che li ho visti.

translation.en: [Sullivan] Gacy was, uh, sentenced to the penitentiary for misusing a young boy.
translation.it: Gacy fu condannato per aver abusato di un ragazzo.

translation.en: Wow, did that open our eyes at that particular time.
translation.it: Wow, in quel momento ci aprì gli occhi.

translation.en: Now, what do we do with that?
translation.it: Cosa dovevamo fare?

translation.en: How do we go and keep an eye on Gacy?
translation.it: Come potevamo tenere d'occhio Gacy?

translation.en: Where might he lead us?
translation.it: Dove avrebbe potuto portarci?

translation.en: [Albrecht] Lieutenant Joe Kozenczak, who was the head of the investigations,
translation.it: Il tenente Joe Kozenczak, a capo delle indagini,

translation.en: plotted a surveillance on Gacy 24 hours.
translation.it: pensò a una sorveglianza 24 ore su 24 su Gacy.

translation.en: So Bob Schultz and Ron Robinson started the noon to midnight.
translation.it: Così Bob Schultz e Ron Robinson iniziarono da mezzogiorno a mezzanotte.

translation.en: And Dave Hachmeister was at midnight to noon.
translation.it: E Dave Hachmeister da mezzanotte a mezzogiorno.

translation.en: I became his partner, and we were on Gacy from midnight to, uh, to noon,
translation.it: Diventai suo partner e seguimmo Gacy da mezzanotte a mezzogiorno,

translation.en: wherever he went.
translation.it: ovunque andasse.

translation.en: [Sullivan] The police were supposed to be undercover,
translation.it: La polizia doveva essere sotto copertura,

translation.en: but it didn't take him but a day to realize that we were following him.
translation.it: ma gli ci volle meno di un giorno per capire che lo stavamo seguendo.

translation.en: At that stage, then we have to try to change our tactics.
translation.it: A quel punto, dovevamo provare a cambiare la nostra tattica.

translation.en: [man 6] And we decided that it would put a lot more psychological pressure on Gacy
translation.it: Stabilimmo che Gacy avrebbe subìto una maggiore pressione psicologica

translation.en: if we did an overt type of surveillance.
translation.it: se avessimo eseguito una sorveglianza palese.

translation.en: And an overt surveillance is where you knock on the individual's door,
translation.it: Una sorveglianza palese è quando bussi alla porta di una persona,

translation.en: introduce yourself and tell him that you're the police
translation.it: ti presenti e gli dici che sei della polizia

translation.en: and that you're gonna be following him 24 hours a day, seven days a week, every place that they go.
translation.it: e che lo seguirai 24 ore su 24, sette giorni su sette, ovunque vada.

translation.en: [Albrecht] The first public place he went into was the Moose Lodge in Des Plaines.
translation.it: Il primo luogo pubblico in cui andò fu la Moose Lodge a Des Plaines.

translation.en: And when Gacy walked in, people just… "John's here!"
translation.it: Quando Gacy entrò, la gente disse: "C'è John!"

translation.en: They gravitated towards him. "How you doing, John? Great to see you!"
translation.it: Si radunarono intorno a lui. "Come stai? È bello vederti!"

translation.en: Kind of the life of the party. That happened quite frequently.
translation.it: Sembrava l'anima della festa. Successe spesso.

translation.en: [Amirante] He seemed to welcome the investigation.
translation.it: Sembrava apprezzare l'indagine.

translation.en: He welcomed the… the jousting, the back and forth with the police.
translation.it: Accettò di buon grado la schermaglia, il botta e risposta con la polizia.

translation.en: [Gacy] Constantly, I was under surveillance.
translation.it: Ero sotto sorveglianza continua.

translation.en: I could have ditched 'em any one of a number of times and gotten away,
translation.it: Avrei potuto seminarli e fuggire in ogni momento,

translation.en: but I was constantly stopping and trying to help them, you know?
translation.it: ma mi fermavo sempre e cercavo di aiutarli.

translation.en: They were slowing me down. He said, "Well, goddamn, you never stop."
translation.it: Mi rallentavano. Mi ha detto: "Non ti fermi mai".

translation.en: I said, "Well, I got things to do."
translation.it: E io: "Ho delle cose da fare.

translation.en: I said, "I got a job going in Aurora, Illinois."
translation.it: Ho un lavoro ad Aurora, Illinois. Uno a Waukegan, Illinois.

translation.en: "I've got one in Waukegan, Illinois. I've got three in Chicago."
translation.it: Ho un lavoro ad Aurora, Illinois. Uno a Waukegan, Illinois. Ne ho tre a Chicago.

translation.en: And I says, "It takes time, and I've got to move around all of them."
translation.it: Mi serve tempo per andare da uno all'altro".

translation.en: [Amirante] He was playing a… a cat and mouse game
translation.it: Giocava al gatto col topo con la polizia.

translation.en: with the police department, trying to outfox them,
translation.it: Giocava al gatto col topo con la polizia. Cercava di fregarli, di manipolare ciò che facevano

translation.en: trying to manipulate what they were doing,
translation.it: Cercava di fregarli, di manipolare ciò che facevano

translation.en: trying to show that he was in control of this situation.
translation.it: e dimostrare di avere il controllo della situazione.

translation.en: [Robinson] One way that John could kinda get even with us for following him
translation.it: Un modo in cui John poteva vendicarsi per il nostro pedinamento

translation.en: was driving like a maniac.
translation.it: era guidare come un pazzo.

translation.en: John would test our driving abilities every day
translation.it: Ogni giorno metteva alla prova le nostre capacità di guida.

translation.en: going up and down side streets.
translation.it: Sceglieva le strade secondarie.

translation.en: He would be doing 40, 50 miles an hour on these side streets.
translation.it: Andava a 60 o 80 km/h su queste strade secondarie.

translation.en: And when we would get on, like, the Kennedy Expressway,
translation.it: Quando prendevamo la Kennedy Expressway,

translation.en: there were many times where, in trying to keep up with John,
translation.it: a volte per cercare di stare al passo con John

translation.en: we would have to ride on the shoulder of the road,
translation.it: dovevamo guidare sul ciglio della strada,

translation.en: either on the inside of the Kennedy or the outside of the Kennedy,
translation.it: all'interno o all'esterno della Kennedy,

translation.en: just trying to keep up with him.
translation.it: solo per stargli dietro.

translation.en: We're gonna stay with you all the time.
translation.it: Stavamo sempre con lui.

translation.en: If he went into a coffee shop for coffee,
translation.it: Se entrava in una caffetteria,

translation.en: we went in with John and sat with him and had coffee.
translation.it: entravamo con John e ci sedevamo a bere un caffè.

translation.en: If he went into a bar, we went into the bar with him.
translation.it: Se entrava in un bar, entravamo con lui.

translation.en: [Albrecht] During these stops at restaurants, we had quite long conversations with Gacy.
translation.it: Durante le soste al ristorante, parlammo a lungo con Gacy.

translation.en: People started seeing us there all the time with Gacy,
translation.it: La gente iniziò a vederci sempre insieme,

translation.en: and so Gacy would, uh, describe us as the FBI trying to get some kind of drug case on him.
translation.it: quindi diceva che eravamo l'FBI che cercava di incastrarlo per droga.

translation.en: A couple places he went, he described us as his bodyguards.
translation.it: In un paio di posti disse che eravamo le guardie del corpo.

translation.en: But he also told us that he had hired people to follow us
translation.it: Ma ci disse anche che aveva assunto delle persone per seguire noi,

translation.en: to watch us,
translation.it: per controllarci,

translation.en: and if he gave the sign, they were gonna take us out.
translation.it: e che se avesse dato il segnale, loro ci avrebbero fatto fuori.

translation.en: So, uh, we were aware that Gacy was full of himself.
translation.it: Sapevamo che Gacy era pieno di sé.

translation.en: One time, he told us that he had heard
translation.it: Una volta ci disse che aveva saputo

translation.en: that Rob Piest was found up in, uh, Wisconsin and he was all right.
translation.it: che Rob Piest era stato trovato in Wisconsin e stava bene.

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] Rob would never run away.
translation.it: Rob non sarebbe mai scappato.

translation.en: There was something wrong.
translation.it: Qualcosa non andava.

translation.en: The police came to visit me at school with the Piest family
translation.it: La polizia venne a scuola con la famiglia Piest

translation.en: to see, you know, what did Rob say and, um, where was he going.
translation.it: per vedere cosa aveva detto Rob e dove era andato.

translation.en: And I explained that Rob said he was going outside to talk to the contractor about a job.
translation.it: Spiegai che aveva detto che sarebbe uscito a parlare con l'appaltatore di un lavoro.

translation.en: They told me later that the contractor denied all that,
translation.it: Mi dissero che l'appaltatore aveva negato tutto,

translation.en: that I was lying, and he never talked to that boy about getting a job.
translation.it: che io mentivo e non aveva mai parlato di un lavoro a quel ragazzo.

translation.en: I was so angry 'cause I never lie.
translation.it: Ero furiosa, perché non mento mai.

translation.en: [Bedoe] I was working with the Des Plaines police, but I wasn't a member.
translation.it: Lavoravo con la polizia di Des Plaines, ma non ne facevo parte.

translation.en: I was the investigator with the Cook County Sheriff's Dept. assigned to the State's Attorney's office.
translation.it: Ero investigatore della contea di Cook, assegnato all'ufficio del procuratore.

translation.en: I was like an in-between guy.
translation.it: Ero una specie di intermediario.

translation.en: Fortunately, I could do whatever I wanted to, uh, most of the time because of my position.
translation.it: Per fortuna, potevo agire come volevo quasi sempre, grazie alla mia posizione.

translation.en: If something needed to be investigated, I did it.
translation.it: Se c'era da indagare, lo facevo io.

translation.en: I didn't have to get permission from anybody. I just went out and did it.
translation.it: Non dovevo chiedere permessi, uscivo e lo facevo.

translation.en: We looked at his rap sheet. He had other arrests.
translation.it: Guardammo la sua fedina. Aveva avuto altri arresti, ma non sembravano legati al sesso.

translation.en: But they didn't jump off the rap sheet as being sexually related.
translation.it: Aveva avuto altri arresti, ma non sembravano legati al sesso.

translation.en: A lot of times, they were, like, disorderly conduct or battery or whatever.
translation.it: Erano disturbo della quiete pubblica o aggressione o altro.

translation.en: You know, they didn't really go into the detail of he was soliciting a kid for sex.
translation.it: Non entravano nei dettagli del fatto che adescasse ragazzi per fare sesso.

translation.en: You know, those details weren't there.
translation.it: Non c'erano dettagli.

translation.en: [Amirante] Gacy was part of that powerful Democratic Party.
translation.it: Gacy faceva parte del potente Partito Democratico.

translation.en: You don't think a phone call could have been made to the local police department,
translation.it: Il dipartimento di polizia avrebbe potuto ricevere una chiamata:

translation.en: saying, "Leave this guy alone. He's, uh, a decent… He's a good guy."
translation.it: "Lasciatelo in pace, è una brava persona".

translation.en: "He's a good guy." And that's how Cook County used to work back then.
translation.it: "Lasciatelo in pace, è una brava persona". È così che funzionava la contea di Cook.

translation.en: And, you know, people were looking down at… at gay kids at the time, gay young men.
translation.it: All'epoca la gente disprezzava i ragazzi gay.

translation.en: You think the police were about to listen to the gay guy that came in
translation.it: Pensate che la polizia avrebbe ascoltato un ragazzo gay

translation.en: and… and beefed about Gacy, who everybody knew,
translation.it: che si lamentava di Gacy, che tutti conoscevano ed era amico di tutti?

translation.en: and, you know, he was… he was friends with everybody?
translation.it: che tutti conoscevano ed era amico di tutti?

translation.en: [Tovar] Gacy's choice for workers was always young men, small in stature,
translation.it: Gacy sceglieva sempre come operai dei ragazzi giovani, di bassa statura,

translation.en: usually light-colored hair.
translation.it: di solito con i capelli chiari.

translation.en: [Amirante] The two main guys that we encountered was Mike Rossi and David Cram.
translation.it: I due ragazzi più importanti furono Mike Rossi e David Cram.

translation.en: Michael Rossi and David Cram were Gacy's assistants at PDM Contractors
translation.it: Rossi e Cram erano assistenti di Gacy alla PDM Contractors.

translation.en: who worked very closely with him in everything he did.
translation.it: Lavoravano sempre a stretto contatto con lui.

translation.en: But they were basically his little…
translation.it: In pratica erano i suoi piccoli…

translation.en: They were gofers, and they would help him running the business, they'd help him run his business.
translation.it: Erano i suoi galoppini e l'aiutavano a gestire l'impresa

translation.en: [Sullivan] As we're going through the investigation and we talk to people and find out that,
translation.it: Nel corso della nostra indagine, parlammo con la gente e scoprimmo:

translation.en: "Yeah, there's a kid by the name of such-and-such."
translation.it: "Sì, c'è un ragazzo che si chiama così.

translation.en: "He worked for Gacy at a time. I haven't seen him in a while."
translation.it: Lavorava per Gacy, non lo vedo da tempo".

translation.en: And then we got, uh… people started coming… coming forward, saying,
translation.it: Poi la gente iniziò a farsi avanti dicendo:

translation.en: you know, "I know this guy. He worked there. He's missing too."
translation.it: "Lo conosco, lavorava lì. È scomparso anche lui".

translation.en: Gregory Godzik was a Chicago boy.
translation.it: Gregory Godzik era un ragazzo di Chicago.

translation.en: He had worked for Gacy, and, uh, he turned up missing.
translation.it: Aveva lavorato per Gacy ed era scomparso.

translation.en: [Bedoe] And then, we… we find out that another kid that used to work for Gacy, he's up and disappeared.
translation.it: Poi scoprimmo che un altro ragazzo che aveva lavorato per Gacy era scomparso.

translation.en: John Butkovich one day didn't show up for work. Nobody ever saw him again.
translation.it: Un giorno John Butkovich non andò al lavoro. Nessuno lo vide più.

translation.en: The police came by asking questions. You know, nothing.
translation.it: La polizia andò fare domande: niente.

translation.en: Gacy denied knowing anything about the kid's disappearance.
translation.it: Gacy negò di sapere della scomparsa del ragazzo.

translation.en: [Tovar] The class ring that had the initials JS
translation.it: L'anello del liceo con le iniziali J.S.

translation.en: that we found in Gacy's house during the search warrant
translation.it: che trovammo a casa di Gacy durante la perquisizione

translation.en: turned out to belong to a young man named John Szyc.
translation.it: si rivelò essere di un ragazzo di nome John Szyc.

translation.en: And had lived in Des Plaines, but, uh, had moved into the city.
translation.it: Aveva vissuto a Des Plaines, ma si era trasferito in città.

translation.en: Uh, we contacted his parents,
translation.it: Contattammo i suoi genitori

translation.en: and his mother told us that he had been missing for a while.
translation.it: e sua madre ci disse che era scomparso da un po'.

translation.en: [Bedoe] John Szyc's car was never recovered when he disappeared.
translation.it: L'auto di John Szyc non era mai stata ritrovata.

translation.en: And then, during the course of the investigation,
translation.it: E poi, nel corso dell'indagine,

translation.en: when I got the information from Szyc's parents what car he'd been driving,
translation.it: quando i genitori di Szyc ci dissero quale auto guidasse,

translation.en: one of the guys, might've been Tovar said,
translation.it: uno dei ragazzi, forse Tovar, disse:

translation.en: "That's the same kind of car that Mike Rossi's driving."
translation.it: "È la stessa auto che guida Mike Rossi".

translation.en: The VIN number was altered.
translation.it: Il numero di telaio era alterato.

translation.en: And then Gacy sold it to Rossi for, you know, pennies on the dollar.
translation.it: Gacy l'aveva venduta a Rossi per pochi spiccioli.

translation.en: [Robinson] That put John in contact, or knowing, four or five different people
translation.it: Questo metteva John in contatto o conoscenza con quattro o cinque diverse persone

translation.en: who had come up missing that had never been located.
translation.it: che erano scomparse e non erano mai state ritrovate.

translation.en: This is highly unusual.
translation.it: Era molto insolito.

translation.en: I mean, most people don't know any missing peop… person,
translation.it: La maggior parte della gente non conosce nessuna persona scomparsa,

translation.en: let alone coming to know four or five.
translation.it: figuriamoci quattro o cinque.

translation.en: [Sullivan] All of these things were going on at the same time.
translation.it: Tutte queste cose avvenivano nello stesso momento.

translation.en: We were suspecting a bad outcome.
translation.it: Sospettavamo una brutta conclusione.

translation.en: But we also knew that we didn't have any bodies.
translation.it: Ma sapevamo anche di non avere corpi.

translation.en: [Bedoe] Why are these people vanishing, never to be found or seen again?
translation.it: Perché scompaiono senza essere più ritrovati?

translation.en: Bodies never discovered.
translation.it: Corpi mai scoperti.

translation.en: You're scratching your head, you're going, "What happened? They just vanished."
translation.it: C'era da scervellarsi. Cos'è successo? Sono svaniti.

translation.en: "Never turned up. Where did they go?"
translation.it: Mai ricomparsi, dove sono finiti?

translation.en: [Sullivan] You know, "When does this end? What have we got here?"
translation.it: Quando finirà? Cosa abbiamo qui?

translation.en: 'Cause truly, we didn't know.
translation.it: Non lo sapevamo davvero.

translation.en: [Bedoe] The scary part was that his attorneys had run down to the federal court
translation.it: La cosa allarmante era che i suoi avvocati si erano rivolti alla corte federale

translation.en: and applied for a federal injunction against the State's Attorney's office
translation.it: per chiedere un'ingiunzione federale contro l'ufficio del procuratore

translation.en: and the Des Plaines Police Department.
translation.it: e la polizia di Des Plaines.

translation.en: [Amirante] Leroy Stevens, who was his civil lawyer for his company at the time, and I
translation.it: Io e Leroy Stevens, il suo avvocato civilista,

translation.en: were in the midst of preparing a federal lawsuit against the Des Plaines Police Department
translation.it: stavamo preparando una causa federale contro la polizia di Des Plaines,

translation.en: um, to enjoin them from, uh, harassing Gacy.
translation.it: per impedire loro di tormentare Gacy.

translation.en: And really ruining his business
translation.it: Gli stavano rovinando gli affari,

translation.en: because they were following him so closely and violating his civil rights.
translation.it: perché lo seguivano da vicino e ne violavano i diritti civili.

translation.en: Terry Sullivan, who was the prosecutor, was playing it close to the vest.
translation.it: Terry Sullivan, il procuratore, giocava a carte coperte.

translation.en: The police department was playing it close to the vest. We couldn't get information.
translation.it: La polizia faceva lo stesso. Non riuscivamo ad avere informazioni.

translation.en: The only way we'd get to the bottom of it was file the lawsuit.
translation.it: L'unico modo per sapere qualcosa era fare causa.

translation.en: [Bedoe] If he gets that injunction approved, that's the end of it.
translation.it: Se avessero approvato l'ingiunzione, sarebbe stata la fine.

translation.en: We'd have to back off altogether. Can't interview him, his employees, nothing.
translation.it: Avremmo dovuto tirarci indietro, senza interrogare lui o i dipendenti.

translation.en: So yeah, time was of the essence. There's no question about it.
translation.it: Bisognava fare presto, senza dubbio.

translation.en: [Amirante] You have to understand that, at the time,
translation.it: Dovete capire che all'epoca

translation.en: Leroy and I really truly believed Gacy was innocent.
translation.it: io e Leroy credevamo davvero che Gacy fosse innocente.

translation.en: Terry Sullivan eventually told me about the case that John had in Iowa,
translation.it: Alla fine Terry Sullivan mi raccontò del caso di John in Iowa.

translation.en: which was a sodomy case, which, you know, I was shocked that he had that
translation.it: Era un caso di sodomia e questo mi sconvolse.

translation.en: 'cause no… who expected Gacy, this guy who was the precinct captain,
translation.it: Chi si aspettava che Gacy, il capitano di distretto,

translation.en: to have been convicted of sodomy? Nobody knew that.
translation.it: avesse una condanna? Nessuno lo sapeva.

translation.en: [Gacy] I was sentenced to Fort Madison, Iowa,
translation.it: Mi hanno mandato a Fort Madison, Iowa.

translation.en: which was a penitentiary,
translation.it: Era un penitenziario.

translation.en: but then they revised it and said
translation.it: Poi hanno rivisto il caso.

translation.en: that since I was a first offender and I was still under 26,
translation.it: Era la prima condanna e avevo meno di 26 anni.

translation.en: that I should be sent to the men's reformatory at Anamosa.
translation.it: Mi avrebbero mandato al riformatorio di Anamosa.

translation.en: I was sent there. I was scared to death.
translation.it: Mi hanno mandato laggiù ed ero terrorizzato.

translation.en: Again, never being arrested before,
translation.it: Non ero mai stato arrestato o messo in carcere.

translation.en: never being in jail before, didn't know what the hell…
translation.it: Non ero mai stato arrestato o messo in carcere. Non sapevo cosa fosse, pensavo mi avrebbero ucciso.

translation.en: I thought I was gonna get killed in there.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa fosse, pensavo mi avrebbero ucciso.

translation.en: ♪ O come let us adore him ♪ ♪ O come let us adore him ♪
translation.it: NATALE AD ANAMOSA SEZIONE NOTIZIE SPECIALI, 1969

translation.en: …I got into it and organized myself.
translation.it: Alla fine sono finito dentro e mi sono organizzato.

translation.en: I went in there with a positive attitude.
translation.it: Sono entrato con un atteggiamento positivo.

translation.en: And, uh, I became not only popular, but powerful.
translation.it: Sono diventato non solo popolare, ma potente.

translation.en: Hello, I'm John Gacy. I'm from Waterloo, Iowa.
translation.it: Salve, sono John Gacy. Vengo da Waterloo, Iowa.

translation.en: [man 7] And you're a man of some authority here. What's your title?
translation.it: Sei un uomo di una certa autorità. Qual è il tuo titolo?

translation.en: Well, I'm first cook in the kitchen,
translation.it: Beh, sono capocuoco in cucina

translation.en: and I run the, uh, the morning meal and the afternoon meal in the kitchen.
translation.it: e mi occupo del pasto mattutino e del pasto pomeridiano.

translation.en: Food was a… was an avenue of power
translation.it: Il cibo era una strada verso il potere.

translation.en: is… is I guess that's how I would describe it,
translation.it: Il cibo era una strada verso il potere. Immagino che potrei descriverlo così, una strada verso il potere.

translation.en: would be an avenue of power.
translation.it: Immagino che potrei descriverlo così, una strada verso il potere.

translation.en: And John used it relentlessly.
translation.it: E John la usava implacabilmente.

translation.en: Screw with John Gacy
translation.it: Rompevi le palle a John Gacy

translation.en: and you better start taking your meals somewhere else
translation.it: e ti conveniva iniziare a mangiare da un'altra parte,

translation.en: because you had to assume that you're gonna get something like,
translation.it: perché potevi dare per scontato che avresti trovato qualcosa come,

translation.en: for lack of a better description,
translation.it: in mancanza di descrizioni migliori,

translation.en: mouse turds in your… in your food the next time you come through
translation.it: escrementi di topo nel tuo cibo,

translation.en: because you didn't do what he said.
translation.it: perché non avevi fatto come diceva.

translation.en: [Gacy] Without force, I controlled the kitchen, and there was some 55 inmates in the kitchen.
translation.it: Senza sforzi, controllavo la cucina, dove c'erano circa 55 detenuti.

translation.en: But I never yield to anybody.
translation.it: Ma non mi piegavo davanti a nessuno.

translation.en: [Cornell] The other thing, of course, was the… the Jaycees,
translation.it: L'altra cosa, ovviamente, erano i Jaycees.

translation.en: and that's how I met him.
translation.it: È così che l'ho conosciuto.

translation.en: I'm sitting there reading or something,
translation.it: Ero seduto lì a leggere

translation.en: and he said, "Hi, I'm John Gacy, and, uh, I'm recruiting for the Jaycees."
translation.it: e lui disse: "Ciao, sono John Gacy e sto reclutando per i Jaycees".

translation.en: I didn't even know what the hell the Jaycees was at that point.
translation.it: Allora non sapevo neanche cosa diavolo fossero.

translation.en: By halfway through the time that we were there,
translation.it: Ma a metà del periodo che passammo lì,

translation.en: say toward the end of 1969,
translation.it: diciamo verso la fine del 1969,

translation.en: that was one of the largest Jaycee chapters in the entire state of Iowa,
translation.it: quella era una delle sezioni più grandi in tutto lo Stato dell'Iowa,

translation.en: largely due to the recruiting efforts of John Gacy.
translation.it: in gran parte grazie agli sforzi di reclutamento di John Gacy.

translation.en: …at the Anamosa Men's Reformatory.
translation.it: Sono stato premiato come Uomo dell'Anno al riformatorio maschile di Anamosa.

translation.en: I built the first miniature golf course inside the walls of a reformatory.
translation.it: Ho costruito il primo golf in miniatura dentro un riformatorio.

translation.en: [Cornell] This is an example of the man's abilities and talent.
translation.it: È un esempio delle capacità e del talento di quell'uomo.

translation.en: I think you could make a case that there was a good John and a bad John.
translation.it: Credo si possa sostenere che c'era un John buono e uno cattivo.

translation.en: I knew the good John.
translation.it: Io conoscevo il John buono.

translation.en: I had glimpses of other things.
translation.it: Avevo intravisto altre cose.

translation.en: [Gacy] The weak do not survive in prison.
translation.it: I deboli non sopravvivono in carcere.

translation.en: You either come under, uh, the ruling of… of some gang or… or some other forceful inmate.
translation.it: Finisci agli ordini di qualche gang o di qualche altro detenuto violento.

translation.en: You do what he says, otherwise you get the shit kicked out of you.
translation.it: Fai come dicono o ti fanno a pezzi.

translation.en: Well, I would not bow to any of that shit
translation.it: Io mi non mi sarei piegato a quella merda,

translation.en: because nobody will ever lead me.
translation.it: perché nessuno mi comanderà mai.

translation.en: He was walking on the range that he lived in, over in the south house,
translation.it: Stava camminando nella sua zona, nell'edificio sud,

translation.en: and he saw one inmate performing fellatio on another inmate in a cell,
translation.it: e vide un detenuto che faceva una fellatio a un altro detenuto in una cella.

translation.en: and just simply walked over, and kicked the guy in the face four times,
translation.it: Si avvicinò e lo colpì a calci in faccia quattro volte,

translation.en: and basically broke his jaw.
translation.it: rompendogli la mascella.

translation.en: He's struggling with his sexual urges toward homosexuals.
translation.it: Combatteva con i suoi impulsi sessuali verso gli omosessuali.

translation.en: That came out in his, in my opinion…
translation.it: A mio parere, si manifestava nella sua personalità

translation.en: That came out in his personality as anger, as rage.
translation.it: A mio parere, si manifestava nella sua personalità come rabbia, come collera.

translation.en: [man 7] How long have you been here?
translation.it: John, da quanto sei qui?

translation.en: I've been here now a year and about two weeks.
translation.it: Sono qui da un anno e due settimane circa.

translation.en: [man 7] You mind my asking how long do you plan to take up residence here?
translation.it: Ti dispiace se ti chiedo per quanto tempo intendi restare qui?

translation.en: Well, I hope to be getting out sometime in May.
translation.it: Beh, spero di uscire a maggio.

translation.en: [man 7] Well, good. Yes.
translation.it: Beh, buon per te.

translation.en: You gonna continue as a cook, use that as a profession, do you think?
translation.it: Continuerai a fare il cuoco e lo userai come lavoro?

translation.en: Right. This is my profession before I came in.
translation.it: Sì, era il mio lavoro prima di entrare.

translation.en: -[man 7] All right. -Food service.
translation.it: - Bene. - La ristorazione.

translation.en: [Cornell] It was Christmastime.
translation.it: Era intorno a Natale.

translation.en: We were deeply involved in the Toys for Tots project.
translation.it: Eravamo molto coinvolti nel progetto "Toys for Tots".

translation.en: We were deeply involved with the Christmas banquet for the Jaycees.
translation.it: Eravamo molto coinvolti nel banchetto di Natale per i Jaycees.

translation.en: A lot was going on.
translation.it: Erano in ballo molte cose.

translation.en: But then, John's… [clears throat] …John's father died.
translation.it: Ma poi il padre di John morì.

translation.en: [Gacy] December 18th, my dad went in the hospital in Chicago and I was never told of it.
translation.it: Il 18 dicembre papà è finito in ospedale e non mi hanno detto nulla.

translation.en: My dad died December 25th, Christmas Day.
translation.it: Papà è morto il 25 dicembre, il giorno di Natale.

translation.en: They didn't tell me until after my dad was buried that he died.
translation.it: Me l'hanno detto solo dopo la sepoltura.

translation.en: Even after going to the joint for… for this sodomy conviction and all that,
translation.it: Anche dopo essere finito in carcere per la condanna per sodomia,

translation.en: his father was still alive.
translation.it: il padre era ancora vivo.

translation.en: John had the option at some point in time of trying to mend that fence.
translation.it: A un certo punto John avrebbe potuto provare a ricucire quel rapporto.

translation.en: But not after that.
translation.it: Ma non dopo la morte.

translation.en: It was over. It was done.
translation.it: Era finita, andata.

translation.en: I don't recall ever hearing him laugh very much after that.
translation.it: Dopo quel fatto, non ricordo di averlo mai più sentito ridere.

translation.en: [Gacy] What I'm doing is just telling what my dad always told me, is I'm weak.
translation.it: Dico solo ciò che mio papà mi ha sempre detto: sono un debole.

translation.en: Just a dumb, stupid kid. Can't do nothing.
translation.it: Solo uno stupido ragazzino, un incapace.

translation.en: Yeah, he was right about a lot of things. I let him down when he died.
translation.it: Aveva ragione su molte cose. L'ho deluso quando è morto.

translation.en: [Cornell] Most of the people who were serving ten-year sentences
translation.it: La maggior parte delle persone condannate a dieci anni

translation.en: would serve around two years.
translation.it: ne scontava circa due.

translation.en: But because of who we were and what we did inside,
translation.it: Ma visto chi eravamo e quello che facevamo dentro,

translation.en: John and I got out in 18 months.
translation.it: io e John uscimmo in 18 mesi.

translation.en: So he and I basically left, uh, that, uh, second week in July,
translation.it: Io e lui uscimmo nella seconda settimana di luglio,

translation.en: and, uh, we shook hands and walked away.
translation.it: ci stringemmo la mano e ce ne andammo.

translation.en: [Robinson] By being with John everywhere all the time, we were trying to break him down.
translation.it: Stando con John sempre e ovunque, stavamo cercando di farlo crollare.

translation.en: I mean, I think that you can be the most law-abiding citizen in the entire world
translation.it: Penso che tu possa essere il cittadino più rispettoso della legge al mondo,

translation.en: and you still would not want the police to be following you
translation.it: ma non vorresti che la polizia ti seguisse

translation.en: 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.it: ventiquattro ore al giorno, sette giorni su sette.

translation.en: [Albrecht] As it went along and the investigators were interviewing Gacy contacts, Gacy's friends,
translation.it: Col tempo, mentre gli investigatori interrogavano conoscenti e amici di Gacy,

translation.en: I think some friends started realizing there's something more to this.
translation.it: alcuni iniziarono a capire che c'era qualcosa sotto.

translation.en: I feel we were all that Gacy had left to talk to. Nobody else wanted much to do with him.
translation.it: Gacy parlava soltanto con noi. Nessuno voleva avere a che fare con lui.

translation.en: [Robinson] In some ways, I think John began to think that we were his best friends.
translation.it: In un certo senso, John iniziò a pensare che fossimo i suoi migliori amici.

translation.en: We weren't giving him a hard time, only following him.
translation.it: Non gli davamo fastidio, lo seguivamo e basta.

translation.en: [Robinson] Many times, he invited us in, trying to show what a nice guy he was
translation.it: Ci invitò spesso a entrare, cercando di mostrare che era buono e gentile con noi.

translation.en: and how amiable he was with us, and it got us into the house.
translation.it: cercando di mostrare che era buono e gentile con noi. Così entrammo nella casa.

translation.en: We had gotten a request from Lieutenant Kozenczak.
translation.it: Avevamo ricevuto una richiesta dal tenente Kozenczak.

translation.en: There were a missing TV and a missing radio from a missing person.
translation.it: C'erano una TV e una radio scomparse appartenenti a una persona scomparsa.

translation.en: [Tovar] John Szyc's mother told us
translation.it: La madre di John Szyc ci aveva detto

translation.en: that a little TV that he had in his bedroom
translation.it: che un piccolo televisore che aveva in camera

translation.en: was missing from his house.
translation.it: era sparito da casa sua.

translation.en: She described it as a Motorola type TV,
translation.it: Lo descrisse come un televisore Motorola

translation.en: and we recalled having seen a TV similar to that when we went into Gacy's house during the search warrant.
translation.it: e ricordammo di averne visto uno simile durante una perquisizione a casa di Gacy.

translation.en: So Bob Schultz said he had to use the restroom,
translation.it: Così Bob Schultz disse di aver bisogno del bagno,

translation.en: which would get him into the other part of the house where he could search.
translation.it: per andare a cercare dall'altra parte della casa.

translation.en: My job became then to keep John entertained so he didn't go looking for Bob.
translation.it: Il mio compito era di intrattenere John, perché non andasse a cercare Bob.

translation.en: Bob looked around, couldn't find the TV.
translation.it: Bob si guardò intorno, ma non trovò la TV.

translation.en: So he's in the bathroom, flushin' the toilet like a good guy should. [laughs]
translation.it: Era in bagno, a tirare lo sciacquone come ogni bravo ragazzo.

translation.en: But then, the heat kicked on.
translation.it: Poi entrò in funzione il riscaldamento.

translation.en: And that made all the difference in the world
translation.it: Quello fece tutta la differenza,

translation.en: because Bob was right there by the heating duct, and this came up,
translation.it: perché Bob era accanto al condotto del riscaldamento

translation.en: and he got a whiff of that like you wouldn't believe.
translation.it: e sentì una zaffata di qualcosa di incredibile.

translation.en: And right away, he thought, "A putrid odor?"
translation.it: Subito pensò: "Odore di putrefazione?"

translation.en: Yes, it was.
translation.it: Proprio così.

translation.en: We've been on the job for too long, we've handled too many dead bodies.
translation.it: Facevamo quel lavoro da troppo tempo, avevamo manipolato troppi cadaveri.

translation.en: If he says that's what it was, you can take it to the bank.
translation.it: Se lui diceva che era così, potevi esserne certo.

translation.en: Schultz recognized an odor that he knew was decomposing flesh.
translation.it: Schultz riconobbe un odore che sapeva essere carne in decomposizione.

translation.en: A body, a dead body.
translation.it: Un corpo, un cadavere.

translation.en: Anyway, he comes back at the end of his shift and tells me about the smell.
translation.it: Tornò alla fine del turno e mi raccontò della puzza.

translation.en: Well at the same time, I was hell-bent on trying to find a way
translation.it: Nello stesso momento, io ero impegnato a trovare un modo

translation.en: to get underneath Gacy's skin
translation.it: per far innervosire Gacy,

translation.en: to… to make him lose his temper and slip up and make a mistake.
translation.it: fargli perdere le staffe e fargli commettere un errore,

translation.en: Say something, you know, that would be incriminating.
translation.it: dire qualcosa di incriminante.

translation.en: David Cram worked for him, for his company PDM.
translation.it: David Cram lavorava per lui, per la sua impresa, la PDM.

translation.en: I said, "Let's get Cram back in here for an interview."
translation.it: Dissi: "Portiamo qui Cram e interroghiamolo.

translation.en: "Drag him back. Let's talk to him some more."
translation.it: Facciamolo parlare ancora".

translation.en: So, I'm talking to Cram, and I said to him,
translation.it: Stavo parlando con Cram e gli dissi:

translation.en: "Did you ever see Gacy completely lose his temper?"
translation.it: "Hai mai visto Gacy perdere completamente le staffe?"

translation.en: He says, "Yeah." I say, "What… what was the circumstance?"
translation.it: Rispose: "Sì". E io: "In che circostanze?"

translation.en: He says, "Well, Gacy had me digging in the crawl space."
translation.it: "Gacy mi aveva fatto scavare nel vespaio.

translation.en: And he says, "I changed directions."
translation.it: Avevo cambiato direzione.

translation.en: "Instead of going on a straight line, I went on a diagonal."
translation.it: Invece di una linea retta, ero andato in diagonale.

translation.en: "Gacy came down to check on what I was doing, how I was digging."
translation.it: Gacy era venuto a controllare come stavo scavando.

translation.en: "He saw a diagonal instead of a straight line, he completely lost his temper."
translation.it: Aveva visto una diagonale e aveva perso le staffe.

translation.en: Swearing, jumping up and down, hollering, screaming,
translation.it: Imprecava, saltava, urlava.

translation.en: "Goddamn it, I told you. I want you to dig here, not here."
translation.it: 'Te l'avevo detto. Voglio che scavi qui, non qui!'"

translation.en: And that's what got me thinking, the whole time we were doing this,
translation.it: Questo mi fece pensare. Fino ad allora avevamo cercato di capire dove fossero finiti.

translation.en: we're trying to figure out where these people went.
translation.it: Fino ad allora avevamo cercato di capire dove fossero finiti.

translation.en: Where are they?
translation.it: Dove erano?

translation.en: And, you know, in my wildest dreams, I say, "It can't possibly be,"
translation.it: Nei miei sogni più sfrenati non pensavo fosse possibile,

translation.en: but then you hear a story,
translation.it: poi sentimmo la storia

translation.en: and then you go, "Is it possible that there's somebody down there?"
translation.it: e pensammo: "È possibile che ci sia qualcuno laggiù?"

translation.en: So I, that… with that, I had, um… my mission was… [laughs]
translation.it: Così la mia missione diventò…

translation.en: …was to get Terry Sullivan to give us a second search warrant,
translation.it: convincere Terry Sullivan a darci un secondo mandato.

translation.en: which is not usual.
translation.it: Una cosa inusuale.

translation.en: Two search warrants on the same property.
translation.it: Due mandati per la stessa proprietà.

translation.en: That was crazy. Come on. We gotta get this second search warrant.
translation.it: Era assurdo! Ottenere un secondo mandato…

translation.en: "We need the second search warrant!" Terry says, "You can't."
translation.it: Terry disse: "Non si può avere un secondo mandato".

translation.en: I said, "We gotta… Figure it out! You're the lawyer!"
translation.it: "Trova un modo! Sei un avvocato!"

translation.en: [Sullivan] What we needed during those days was evidence.
translation.it: In quei giorni avevamo bisogno di prove.

translation.en: We needed to hook the evidence onto Gacy so it wouldn't fall off.
translation.it: Dovevamo collegare le prove a Gacy in modo che gli restassero addosso.

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] "I came home after school to get something to eat before I went shopping."
translation.it: "Sono tornata a casa dopo la scuola per mangiare prima di fare shopping.

translation.en: "The phone rang, they asked me questions about the film slip."
translation.it: Mi hanno chiamata per chiedere della pellicola."

translation.en: The night that Rob went missing,
translation.it: La sera in cui Rob scomparve,

translation.en: I was, um, handing in some film to be processed at the pharmacy.
translation.it: stavo consegnando un rullino da sviluppare alla farmacia. SVILUPPO PELLICOLE RAPIDO

translation.en: And I filled out my envelope,
translation.it: Avevo riempito la mia busta

translation.en: and I put it in the pack that was to be picked up.
translation.it: e l'avevo messa nel pacco che avrebbero dovuto ritirare.

translation.en: And I tore off the receipt,
translation.it: Avevo strappato la ricevuta

translation.en: and then I put the receipt in the little trash box that was near the side of the cash register.
translation.it: e l'avevo messa nel cestino accanto al registratore di cassa.

translation.en: And then, um, I just kind of stopped.
translation.it: Poi mi ero bloccata.

translation.en: And then, I stared at that receipt, and it stared back at me.
translation.it: Avevo fissato la ricevuta e la ricevuta aveva fissato me.

translation.en: And for an unknown reason, I grabbed the receipt and I stuck it in Rob's jacket pocket.
translation.it: Senza sapere perché, l'avevo presa e infilata nella giacca di Rob.

translation.en: [Sullivan] Thank God Kim Byers had put that little receipt
translation.it: Grazie a Dio, Kim Byers aveva messo quella ricevuta,

translation.en: into her pocket, which turns out to be Rob's coat.
translation.it: nella tasca di quella che risultò essere la giacca di Rob.

translation.en: [Byers-Lund] Those are those hunches, or intuitions, whatever you wanna call them.
translation.it: Sono presentimenti, intuizioni o come volete chiamarli,

translation.en: They drive us to do things that we're not sure why we do.
translation.it: che ci spingono a fare cose senza sapere perché.

translation.en: I call them "God whispers,"
translation.it: Io li chiamo "sussurri di Dio".

translation.en: where someone guides you to do something.
translation.it: Qualcuno ti guida a fare qualcosa.

translation.en: [Tovar] That receipt wound up in the trash at John Wayne Gacy's house.
translation.it: Quella ricevuta era finita in un cestino a casa di John Wayne Gacy.

translation.en: And that was our first connection putting Robert in that house.
translation.it: Fu il nostro primo collegamento con Robert in quella casa.

translation.en: [Sullivan] We had it sent out to the crime lab
translation.it: La mandammo al laboratorio

translation.en: to see if they could match it up to the envelope of developed film.
translation.it: per vedere se corrispondeva alla busta della pellicola sviluppata.

translation.en: And, in fact, there was a match, exactly how it was torn off
translation.it: In effetti c'era una corrispondenza esatta tra come era stata strappata

translation.en: and the different little pieces and angles that were still in there.
translation.it: e i diversi pezzetti e angoli che erano ancora presenti.

translation.en: Wow, it perfectly matched.
translation.it: Combaciava perfettamente.

translation.en: We were, of course, very happy 'cause that looks really good in court.
translation.it: Ne fummo molto felici, perché era una prova solida.

translation.en: [Bedoe] The receipt for the film from Kim Byers, plus the smell,
translation.it: La ricevuta della pellicola di Kim Byers, in aggiunta all'odore,

translation.en: that was enough for Terry to say okay, and he drew up a second warrant.
translation.it: era sufficiente perché Terry desse l'ok e scrivesse il secondo mandato.

translation.en: [Robinson] We had a lot of heat on him at this time,
translation.it: In quel momento avevamo roba scottante.

translation.en: and we could tell from John's deportment that he could feel the pressure too.
translation.it: Dal comportamento di John si capiva che anche lui sentiva la pressione.

translation.en: [Amirante] The net was kind of closing in on him. The web was closing in on him at the time.
translation.it: In quel momento la rete si stava stringendo su di lui.

translation.en: His cat and mouse game was coming to an end.
translation.it: Il gioco del gatto e il topo stava finendo.

translation.en: [Tovar] I think we started noticing that something was happening to him,
translation.it: Credo che iniziammo a notare che gli stava succedendo qualcosa.

translation.en: which eventually did. He finally just kinda went off the rails a little bit.
translation.it: Alla fine fu così, alla fine andò un po' fuori di testa.

translation.en: [Amirante] John Gacy called me, wanted to get together
translation.it: John Gacy mi chiamò per vedermi.

translation.en: because he told me that he had something new to tell me and Leroy Stevens.
translation.it: Disse che aveva qualcosa di nuovo da dire a me e a Leroy Stevens.

translation.en: And I told him, "John, if it's something new, fine."
translation.it: "John, se è qualcosa di nuovo, va bene.

translation.en: "Otherwise, I don't wanna hear the same old bullshit from you."
translation.it: Altrimenti, non voglio sentire le solite stronzate."

translation.en: [Gacy] Rationally and understandably,
translation.it: Razionalmente e comprensibilmente,

translation.en: I went over to talk to Sam about the harassment,
translation.it: sono andato a parlare con Sam delle molestie.

translation.en: not of me,
translation.it: Non nei miei confronti,

translation.en: but why they were harassing my employees.
translation.it: ma nei confronti dei miei dipendenti.

translation.en: Why was I defending them?
translation.it: Perché li difendevo?

translation.en: Was I afraid they were gonna say something about what I was doing?
translation.it: Avevo paura che dicessero qualcosa di quello che facevo?

translation.en: He came and told me the same old story, vehemently denying anything to do with this kid.
translation.it: Venne e mi raccontò la solita storia, negando tutto su quel ragazzo.

translation.en: I… I didn't believe him anymore. I really did not believe him.
translation.it: Non gli credevo più, davvero.

translation.en: I had a picture of Robbie Piest
translation.it: Avevo una foto di Robbie Piest

translation.en: that was on the front page of the Daily Herald, the suburban news daily out there.
translation.it: presa dalla prima pagina del Daily Herald, il quotidiano di quella zona.

translation.en: I started pounding on the table. I said… I said, "Look at this, Gacy! Look at this, John!"
translation.it: Iniziai a battere sul tavolo, dicendo: "Guarda qui, Gacy! Guarda qui, John!

translation.en: "This kid is missing! They think you did it!"
translation.it: Questo ragazzo è scomparso! Pensano sia stato tu!

translation.en: "Stop lying to me!"
translation.it: Smettila di mentirmi!"

translation.en: I yelled at him like that. I pounded the thing.
translation.it: Gli urlavo contro e battevo.

translation.en: And he got very sheepish, and he said, "Do you have anything to drink here?"
translation.it: Si mostrò molto abbattuto e disse: "Hai qualcosa da bere?"

translation.en: I poured a little vino for me, a little bit for Gacy, little bit for Stevens.
translation.it: Versai un po' di vino per me, un po' per Gacy e un po' per Stevens.

translation.en: We each drank a shot of it.
translation.it: Bevemmo tutti un bicchierino.

translation.en: And Gacy said, "Fill up my cup."
translation.it: Gacy disse: "Riempimi il bicchiere".

translation.en: And I filled his cup up,
translation.it: Gli riempii il bicchiere.

translation.en: and he just chugged it down, chugged it down.
translation.it: Lo buttò giù tutto.

translation.en: He looks at the picture of Robbie Piest, he goes, um… [clicks tongue]
translation.it: Guardò la foto di Robbie Piest e disse:

translation.en: "This boy is dead." Just like that.
translation.it: "Questo ragazzo è morto". Proprio così.

translation.en: My heart…
translation.it: Il mio cuore…

translation.en: My heart start… boom-boom… started pounding.
translation.it: Il mio cuore iniziò a battere forte.

translation.en: It was just… I'm like, "What? What am I getting into here?"
translation.it: Pensavo: "In cosa mi sto cacciando?"

translation.en: Then he says… And Leroy and I are just sitting here watching him, and he goes,
translation.it: Io e Leroy eravamo seduti a guardare e lui disse:

translation.en: "I've been a judge, jury, and executioner of many, many people."
translation.it: "Sono stato giudice, giuria e carnefice di molte persone.

translation.en: Now I wanna be my own judge, jury, and executioner."
translation.it: Ora voglio esserlo di me stesso.

translation.en: "I wanna tell you everything that happened."
translation.it: Voglio dirvi tutto".

translation.en: [Amirante] I aged many, many years during that night, uh,
translation.it: Quella sera invecchiai di molti anni,

translation.en: both as a lawyer, uh, and as a person.
translation.it: sia come avvocato che come persona.

translation.en: It was one of the scariest nights of my life.
translation.it: Fu una delle notti più spaventose della mia vita.

translation.en: My heart was pounding out of my chest the rest of the night,
translation.it: Il cuore mi batté forte per il resto della serata.

translation.en: s-smoking one cigarette after another one.
translation.it: Fumai una sigaretta dopo l'altra.

translation.en: Leroy was smoking. He turned… He… he lit his cigarettes backwards. The filter was on the wrong end.
translation.it: Leroy accese le sigarette al contrario, col filtro dalla parte sbagliata.

translation.en: And after he told us all this…
translation.it: Dopo averci raccontato tutto…

translation.en: he, um… he fell asleep.
translation.it: si addormentò.

translation.en: [Gacy] I don't remember exactly what happened.
translation.it: Non ricordo bene cos'è successo.

translation.en: I can remember I went to Sam's office,
translation.it: Ricordo l'ufficio di Sam,

translation.en: but I did not go to Sam's office to tell him all that shit.
translation.it: ma non ero andato per dirgli quelle stronzate.

translation.en: Evidently, when I got there…
translation.it: Evidentemente, quando sono arrivato…

translation.en: something else took over and some other conversation come up.
translation.it: qualcun altro ha preso il comando ed è iniziata un'altra conversazione.

translation.en: It was a horrible, professional, ethical spot for me as a young lawyer.
translation.it: Ero in una posizione orribile, professionalmente ed eticamente.

translation.en: I was 30 years old.
translation.it: Avevo 30 anni.

translation.en: And, uh, Leroy, you know, we had to figure…
translation.it: Con Leroy dovevamo capire…

translation.en: The best thing to do is get him to a psychiatrist, have him committed,
translation.it: La cosa migliore era portarlo da uno psichiatra

translation.en: and then figure out what to do with this guy.
translation.it: e poi capire cosa fare di lui.

translation.en: So we set up an appointment for, like, eight o'cl… eight, nine o'clock in the morning
translation.it: Fissammo un appuntamento per le otto o le nove del mattino

translation.en: with the psychiatrist we found during the night.
translation.it: con uno psichiatra trovato durante la notte.

translation.en: [Albrecht] My partner and I started that night
translation.it: Io e il mio partner iniziammo la serata

translation.en: at Gacy's attorney, Sam Amirante's, office in Park Ridge, downtown Park Ridge.
translation.it: nell'ufficio dell'avvocato di Gacy, Sam Amirante, a Park Ridge.

translation.en: So just as I got to the building,
translation.it: Quando arrivai all'edificio,

translation.en: Sam Amirante and his other attorney, Leroy Stevens,
translation.it: Sam Amirante e l'altro avvocato Leroy Stevens

translation.en: were coming out of his office and into the vestibule, the whole building there,
translation.it: stavano uscendo dall'ufficio ed erano nell'atrio dell'edificio.

translation.en: and they invited us in.
translation.it: Ci invitarono a entrare.

translation.en: And they couldn't be nice enough to us. They cou…
translation.it: Non avrebbero potuto essere più gentili.

translation.en: "You want a bottle of booze? Want anything to eat?" Um…
translation.it: "Volete una bottiglia? Qualcosa da mangiare?

translation.en: "Whatever you want, we'll get for you. You can't let Gacy go."
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa, ve la daremo. Non lasciate andare Gacy.

translation.en: "If he tries to leave,
translation.it: Se prova ad andarsene, sparategli alle gomme.

translation.en: you gotta shoot his tires out, and don't let him leave."
translation.it: Se prova ad andarsene, sparategli alle gomme. Non lasciatelo andare, non fatelo."

translation.en: "You can't let him leave."
translation.it: Non lasciatelo andare, non fatelo."

translation.en: Finally, we said, "Sam, we're not gonna shoot somebody's tires out."
translation.it: Dicemmo: "Sam, non spareremo alle gomme di nessuno.

translation.en: "Unless, why? Why should we be taking this kind of activity?"
translation.it: Perché dovremmo fare questo genere di azione?

translation.en: "Just do what you can."
translation.it: "Fate quel che potete.

translation.en: "I can't tell you now, but you… you can't let him go."
translation.it: Non posso dirvelo, ma non lasciatelo andare."

translation.en: [Amirante] About six in the morning, it started to get light.
translation.it: Verso le sei del mattino, iniziò a fare luce.

translation.en: Gacy starts waking up. He goes, "What am I doing here?" You know…
translation.it: Gacy iniziò a svegliarsi e disse: "Cosa ci faccio qui?

translation.en: "What… I got things to do. I got places to go today. I'm… I'm really busy."
translation.it: Ho cose da fare, posti dove andare. Sono molto impegnato".

translation.en: I said, "John, you told me everything. You were here all night."
translation.it: E io: "Mi hai detto tutto, sei stato qui tutta la notte.

translation.en: "Leroy and I, you talked to us, you told us the whole thing."
translation.it: Hai raccontato tutto a me e Leroy".

translation.en: "Well, I can't talk about that. I got places to go, things to do."
translation.it: "Non posso parlarne. Ho posti dove andare, cose da fare.

translation.en: "I'm outta here." Pew…
translation.it: Me ne vado."

translation.en: Takes off.
translation.it: E se ne andò.
